pr_title: HBASE-25439 Add BYTE unit in PrettyPrinter.Unit

timeline.bodyText: Does it have to have a space between the number and the unit? Can it be 10GB instead of '10 GB'?
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: I copied the pretty print format of TTL. But I‘m with you, the space is not necessary. Will update.
replies.author: ZhaoBQ

timeline.message: HBASE-25439 Add BYTE unit in PrettyPrinter.Unit
Remove the space between the number and the unit
Remove the space between the number and the unit
